description: A distributed bug tracker that uses Git's internal storage, so no files are added in your project. You may submit your problems to the same Git remote you use to interact with others, much like commits and branches. More information: https://github.com/MichaelMure/git-bug/blob/master/doc/md/git-bug.md.
